Articles.Content:
Hey guys, how's it going, I've got another question (yes, i have been only asking questions and playing ksp for like the past 5 hours.)

How do I create mods for Kerbal Space Program? I made an Engine model, but how do I unwrap it and make it work in Kerbal Space Program?

 

 

Oh yeah, just remembered one thing that might help, I'm using Wings 3D

Hello.

There is an entire tree of forum goodies over here.

Good luck, and happy Kerbal Space Programming.
thanks, i looked at a beginners tutorial when i was on the bus, ima try it out, you were a huge help (and the guy that mad the tutorial)

GUYS!!!! IM TRYING TO MAKE A PLANET! I HAVE HORRIBLE GRAPHICS CARDS AND THEY WONT UPDATE, SO I CANT USE SPACE ENGINE! But anyways I need help, how do i make a texture, normal, and height map??? Once I learn that I can make a planet (that hopefully works)

Also, If I need modeling software to do it, I have Wings 3D, and for picture editing, i have GIMP (Because I have no money to get the good programs [even tho Wings 3D is pretty good])

2 hours ago, Axilourous said:

GUYS!!!! IM TRYING TO MAKE A PLANET! I HAVE HORRIBLE GRAPHICS CARDS AND THEY WONT UPDATE, SO I CANT USE SPACE ENGINE! But anyways I need help, how do i make a texture, normal, and height map??? Once I learn that I can make a planet (that hopefully works)

Also, If I need modeling software to do it, I have Wings 3D, and for picture editing, i have GIMP (Because I have no money to get the good programs [even tho Wings 3D is pretty good])

Then go talk to the Addon forums. Addon Discussions is a good place to start. A tip: never post in Addon Development until you actually have a working product, or at least something in-game.

 

I've been where you are before-- trust me when I say start small. Do the engine first. Don't jump to Kopernicus planets (they are pretty difficult for a newcomer tbh, speaking from experience)

Edited October 6, 2016 by njmksr

16 hours ago, njmksr said:

Then go talk to the Addon forums. Addon Discussions is a good place to start. A tip: never post in Addon Development until you actually have a working product, or at least something in-game.

 

I've been where you are before-- trust me when I say start small. Do the engine first. Don't jump to Kopernicus planets (they are pretty difficult for a newcomer tbh, speaking from experience)

ok
oh also, the engine, it wont generate thrust... how do i fix this
